com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEntityFetchingViewProcessor, ActionAllowedAuthorizationViewProcessor, DefaultValidationViewProcessor, EntityPropertyRegistryViewProcessor, MessagePrefixingViewProcessor, PageableExtensionViewProcessor, TemplateViewProcessor

    public abstract class SimpleEntityViewProcessorAdapter
extends Object
implements EntityViewProcessor
    Simple adapter for EntityViewProcessor that does not directly tie into the ViewElement generation. If you like more fine-grained methods for building a ViewElement based interface, consider the EntityViewProcessorAdapter adapter instead.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    EntityViewProcessorAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • prepareEntityViewContext

        public void prepareEntityViewContext(ConfigurableEntityViewContext entityViewContext)
        Description copied from interface: EntityViewProcessor
        Apply possible factory modifications to the ConfigurableEntityViewContext. Call this method before creating an EntityViewRequest that uses the context.

        This method is called first, before EntityViewProcessor.authorizeRequest(EntityViewRequest) in the default view rendering.

        Specified by:
        prepareEntityViewContext in interface EntityViewProcessor
        Parameters:
        entityViewContext - to modify

      • authorizeRequest

        public void authorizeRequest(EntityViewRequest entityViewRequest)
        Description copied from interface: EntityViewProcessor
        Verify the EntityViewRequest is valid for this factory. This usually means things like performing security checks and checking all individual properties are valid.

        Any invalid requests are expected to throw the most relevant exceptions.

        Called after EntityViewProcessor.prepareEntityViewContext(ConfigurableEntityViewContext) but before initializing the command object.

        Specified by:
        authorizeRequest in interface EntityViewProcessor
        Parameters:
        entityViewRequest - request to validate

      • initializeCommandObject

        public void initializeCommandObject(EntityViewRequest entityViewRequest,
                                    EntityViewCommand command,
                                    org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder dataBinder)
        Description copied from interface: EntityViewProcessor
        Initialize the EntityViewCommand for the given request. Optionally configure the WebDataBinder that will be used to bind the command object.
        Specified by:
        initializeCommandObject in interface EntityViewProcessor
        Parameters:
        entityViewRequest - request
        command - object
        dataBinder - to bind the web request to the command

      • postProcess

        public void postProcess(EntityViewRequest entityViewRequest,
                        EntityView entityView)
        Description copied from interface: EntityViewProcessor
        Post-process the created EntityView after control and render have completed. This method will always be called, even if render was skipped.
        Specified by:
        postProcess in interface EntityViewProcessor
        Parameters:
        entityViewRequest - request
        entityView - model and view
